titleStmt.title: The Long Parliament is not revived by Tho. Philips. Or, An answer to Tho. Philips his Long Parliament revived. By R. C.
titleStmt.author: R. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for N. W. at the Kings-head in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Thomas Philips, i.e. Sir William Drake. The Long Parliament revived.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings-head in St. Paul's Church-yard
